entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: ILLinker is failing when building a mac-catalyst app #110714
  • [API Proposal]: Decimal.GetBits overload without required array or span creation #110713
  • Decimal.ToString is missing sign for negative zero #110712
  • Different codegen for pinning GetPinnableReference vs GetReference after a length check #110710
  • Stepping Into Statics Helper Code #110709

Closed

  • dotnet publish regularly fails with OutOfMemory after update to .NET 9 #110616
  • IDN test failure on .NET 8.0 #110499
    8.0.x
  • JIT: getting seemingly redundant assembly for particular pattern-based switch #1012
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Expression.Compile: avoid invoking lambda expression receiver when interpreting and calling method other than MulticastDelegate Invoke #110711
    area-System.Linq.Expressions

Merged

  • [Test Only] Port the Idna test fixes to support Unicode 15 #110705
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Improve codegen for ExtractMostSignificantBits #110662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Clear cached data as part of IXCLRDataProcess::Flush #110700
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: capture class types when spilling a GDV arg #110675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result #108661
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Speed up `WasmBuildTests` by using the compression switch #110645
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • vxsort: Add Arm64 Neon implementation and tests #110692
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix assertion due to remorph #110516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2601520 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110558
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Remove GetMethodDescData fallback to legacy DAC #110702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Repair profile after tail-merging #110656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] ValueWitnessTable needs some changes #2881

PullRequests

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
    area-async

Updated

  • [Swift bindings] Make projection tooling AOT compatible #2880
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NUnit is no longer version 3 #45467

Closed

  • 'global.json' not work #2629
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2601367 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable dotnet/sdk debs and rpms in the VMR #45460
    untriaged, Area-VMR

Updated

  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • roslyn-lsp --stdio option #76436
  • API Proposal: Allow creating custom Workspace classes #76433
  • Area - Simplify Delegate Invocation #76425

Closed

  • roslyn-lsp --stdio option (or --pipe with a client-created pipe) #72871
    Backlog
  • Shift+Tab (Outdent / Decrease Indent) does not work in virtual space #55050
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by [UnscopedRef], defensively copied struct and pattern matching #75484
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35613.136 #76432
  • Localized string key in generated .editorconfig #39602
  • "display inline parameter name hints" shortcut not working when "Display all hints while pressing Alt+F1" is checked #58839
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35613.82 #76426

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass caller argument expression through RoslynDebug.Assert #76435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Capture some of the invariants around InputType/NarrowedType in patterns #76434
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Edgio CDN usage #76431
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing, VSCode
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2601449 #76430
    auto-merge
  • Fix crash with simplify delegate invoke #76427
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pull computation up in extract method #76429
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations again in ComputeReverseReferencesMap #76417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move code in extract method to shared location #76421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2600919" #76428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify parsing #76411
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef #59488
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59487
  • MapStaticAssets/CSP problem #59486
  • SignalR Connection String Configuration failure #59485
  • Perf improvement: mvc, single_query #59482

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #59474
  • `dotnet user-jwts` generates incorrect configuration which results in `IDX10500` #59277
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59465

PullRequests

Created

  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59483
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59481
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Do a few tricks to shorten the intermediate output paths for the runtime packs #59479
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Debug stops when open a FilePicker #26639
  • Page specific ResourceDictionary crashes the app on iOS and Android, and not working on Windows #26638
  • [Android & iOS] Shadows & Gradients don't work with a list view's header/footer #26636
  • Arrange override not called on pages #26635
  • [iOS/maccatalyst/Android] Label height in Grid with ColumnSpacing > 0 incorrect in certain cases #26633
  • ReEnable DropEventCoordinates test for mobile platforms #26632
  • Label Text Binding Renders Extra Degree Symbol (°) in .NET MAUI #26630
  • Multicast UDP Packets Stopped Working on iOS MAUI App #26628
  • Can't debug with VSCode or Visual Studio for Windows #26627

Closed

  • [WinUI] Editor width is not updated when setting styles for native view #25684

PullRequests

Created

  • Shadows & Gradients don't work with a list view's header/footer - fix #26637
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 50 #26634
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Enabled DropEventCoordinates test for mobile platforms #26631
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 46 #26570
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [WiP] Fix leak on Command Element #26044
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • Add properties for device tests to configure release/debug #25096
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 40 #26491
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • Fix for CarouselView reverts to displaying 1st item in collection when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider removing support for collections of primitives typed as object array/list used in parameters to queries #35332

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35326
  • Translate to NULLIF #35327
